title: Joko Widodo
summary: Joko Widodo (Indonesian: [dʒɔkɔ widɔdɔ]; born 21 June 1961), also known as Jokowi, is an Indonesian politician and businessman who is the 7th and current president of Indonesia. Elected in July 2014, he was the first Indonesian president not to come from an elite political or military background. He was previously the Mayor of Surakarta from 2005 to 2012 and the Governor of Jakarta from 2012 to 2014. Before his political career, he was an industrialist, carpenter and businessman.[2][3]
